text: Sep 2023: Our NeurIPS 2023 paper gets accepted - AirDelhi: Fine-Grained Spatio-Temporal Particulate Matter Dataset From Delhi For ML based Modeling

title: Sachin Chauhan
text:
With good software development experience, researching now on effective systems and solutions for improved societal and computational sustainability (for traffic congestion and traffic impacted air pollution), using AI/ML with Cloud and Edge Computing.

Research Works
NeurIPS’20: Paper Code
EcoLight: Intersection Control in Developing Regions Under Extreme Budget and Network Constraints
Compass’22 Paper
DynCNN: Application Dynamism and Ambient Temperature Aware Neural Network Scheduler in Edge Devices for Traffic Control
NeurIPS’23: Paper Code
AirDelhi: Fine-Grained Spatio-Temporal Particulate Matter Dataset From Delhi For ML based Modeling
NeurIPS’23 (Workshop on Computational Sustainability)
RealLight: DRL based Intersection Control in Developing Countries without Traffic Simulators
NeurIPS’20 NeurIPS’23 Compass’22
